attributes.action: Stop commercial vans parking in residential streets overnight.
attributes.additional_details: This should apply to all commercial vans bigger than a standard car e.g from a small van that can hold 1pallet (Transit) upwards.
attributes.background: Tradesman who have a commercial company vans with branded logos such as window fitters, electric / construction companies etc should not park in residential areas as they cause blockages and prevent residents from parking.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
